title: "Astellas taps Eko digital stethoscope for heart failure DTx"
excerpt: "Last year, Eko got FDA approval for the CORE 500 device – which combines a stethoscope with a three-lead electrocardiogram (ECG) – which can pick up cardiovascular abnormalities such as heart murmurs, atrial fibrillation (AF) and low left ventricular ejection fraction (LVEF) in seconds during routine physical examinations."
